summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 26 November to end of Friday 26 November GMT
description: A rather unsettled day for Friday, with rain showers by late morning arriving on a strengthening south-westerly wind.<br/><br/>Good local dispersion is expected along with little imported pollution from the maritime air flow.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
